 Hello,

  Myself and my brother just joined your RPg and are a little lost. 
We viewed your website to find out what we needed to know but we are 
still quiet confused. Could it be possible for a short laymans terms 
version of the plot thus far and how to make a created character. We 
both look forward to posting in the near future so any help would be 
appreciated.

Sorry for the inconveniance,
Jon & Zac
